directions: Mix tuna, cranberries, carrot, green onions, cilantro, sesame seeds, ginger, ground chile pepper, and kosher salt together in a large bowl.
Whisk mayonnaise, chile paste, sesame oil, soy sauce, and honey together in a separate bowl; add to tuna mixture and stir to coat.
ingredients: 5 (5 ounce) cans chunk light tuna in water, drained and flaked
1/2 cup sweetened dried cranberries (such as Craisins®)
1/4 cup Asian chile paste (such as sambal oelek)
title: Asian Tuna Salad
